target: AI-curious SMBs, early adopters, executives who don't want to miss the AI wave
hypothesis: AI is the buzzword of the moment, some prospects are specifically looking for it

metadata.title: ZetisLabs — Custom AI Agents for SMBs | Intelligent Automation
metadata.description: Personalized AI agents that understand your business. Writing, analysis, customer support — AI that works for you, not the other way around.

hero.subtitle: We create intelligent agents trained on your data, your tone, your processes. They write, analyze, respond — as if they were part of the team.
hero.cta: Discover what AI can do for you
hero.ctaSecondaryAriaLabel: View the Mail-Writer project on GitHub
hero.badge: Integration with OpenAI, Anthropic, open-source models

context.title: AI is no longer reserved for big companies
paragraphs: ChatGPT changed the game. But copy-pasting into an interface isn't automation.
The real power of AI is when it's integrated into your tools, trained on your data, and works without you having to ask.

useCases.title: What our AI agents can do

items.title: Write your emails
items.description: An agent that learns your writing style and generates follow-up emails, reminders, responses — that sound like you.

items.title: Process your documents
items.description: Automatic classification, information extraction, summaries — the agent reads and organizes for you.

items.title: Answer your customers
items.description: An assistant that knows your products, your FAQ, your tone — and responds 24/7 without human intervention.

items.title: Analyze your data
items.description: Trends, alerts, automatic reports — the agent monitors and notifies you when it matters.

flagship.title: Mail-Writer — Our open-source AI agent
flagship.description: Mail-Writer is an AI agent that writes emails by replicating your writing style.
steps: The agent analyzes your existing emails
It learns your tone, your phrases, your signatures
It generates emails that sound like you
flagship.result: No need to rewrite the same emails. The agent does it for you.

differentiation.title: Not a generic chatbot. An agent trained for you.

rows.zetis: Responds with your tone, your info
Gets the job done without excuses

tech.title: Under the hood

items.label: LLMs
items.value: OpenAI GPT-4, Anthropic Claude, or open-source models depending on your privacy needs

items.label: Fine-tuning
items.value: Agents trained on your specific data

items.label: Integrations
items.value: API, webhooks, direct connection to your tools

items.label: Hosting
items.value: On your servers or ours, your data stays under control

tech.footnote: No black box. We explain how it works.

process.title: How we create your AI agent

steps.title: Scoping
steps.description: We define what the agent should do (and shouldn't do)

steps.title: Data
steps.description: We collect examples to train it (emails, docs, FAQ...)

steps.title: Training
steps.description: We fine-tune the agent on your context

steps.title: Integration
steps.description: We connect it to your tools

cta.title: Ready to have your own AI agent?
cta.description: We start by understanding your needs. Then, we show you what an AI agent could do for you — concretely.
cta.primaryAriaLabel: Book a personalized demo on Calendly
